descriptionHTML:
Turn your Android Wear smartwatch in a fully functional digital speedometer. Determine the current speed without using your cell phone. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start speedometer.


Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features
- Digital speedometer based on your mobile phone's built in GPS
- Supports different scales including Kilometers per hour (km/h), miles per hour (mph) and knots speed scales.
- You can change this scale any time on the move.
- Material design


Where to use?
- Either you are in a bus, train or any other public transport and wonder what is the current speed of this vehicle, Speedometer to your rescue. Just launch the app, wait for a couple of seconds for the GPS to lock and you are ready to go.
- Use it on a bike


You have to own an Android Wear device to use this app
Currently compatible devices:
► HUAWEI Watch
► Moto 360 Gen 2 (2015)
► Moto 360 Gen 1 (2014)
► Asus Zenwatch
► LG G Watch
► LG G Watch R
► LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)
► Samsung Gear Live
► Sony SmartWatch 3


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Speedometer" or say "Start speedometer"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: I used this Speedometer app frequently to check my Motorcycle Speedometer accuracy, especially when changing tires.  Initially it worked perfectly, then after update to Android 7.0, simply stopped working... always reads zero and records no movement.  The Android 7.0 totally Android-Wear for several apps.    Tried Factory Reset, Re-Sync Apps, all things on Web Forums.   No Go.    Good app when it works, try it and if it works, enjoy it!

Doesn't really work. Tested a few times with Huawei Watch, location services on, but it kept showing 0. 100% of the time (the speed was about 30 km/h). It did show the average speed later, but I even don't know if I can really on its number. The design in nice. Deleting.

The app used to work really well. Unfortunately, after upgrading to Android Wear 2.0, or soon after, it's simply stopped working. The speed always shows as zero now. Yes, I have a GPS signal and I can use other means such as GPS Test on the phone itself to get an accurate speed. Speed on my wrist Still Remains at zero all the time. A penny really, has when it worked, it works very very well.

Good, Accurate Little App I ran my good old standby speedometer app on my phone and this one on my watch and drove around. Near perfect agreement. Now that it's been tested, this will be my tool for my old motorcycle with the busted speedometer.
Speed 0? Doesn't show speed even though moving at 100+ km/hr. Samsung galaxy s5, marshmallow, lg urbane
Lag and no reset function. Just go and download another free speedometer app :/
